editorialNotes.standard: Peacock TV is for serious TV fans. It has plenty of familiar titles: The Office, 30 Rock, Parks and Recreation, Saturday Night Live, Downton Abbey, Two and a Half Men, Yellowstone, The King of Queens, and Law & Order: SVU, to name a few. You‚Äôll also find new episodes of The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon and kids‚Äô shows like Curious George, as well as live coverage of Premier League soccer. Looking for wrestling? Peacock is now the home of the WWE‚Äôs new events and its giant streaming library.

editorialNotes.standard: Convinced you‚Äôve run out of things to watch? Amazon Prime Video may be able to prove otherwise. The app is brimming with brilliant films, dramas, and comedies, as well as sports and children‚Äôs TV, all available to watch on demand. We love the ultra-high-quality 4K streaming and the slick UI. Oh, and the ability to create multiple user profiles and download series to watch later. There are also hundreds of Amazon Originals to check out‚Äîgreat series and films produced by Amazon Studios that you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.
editorialNotes.short: Prime entertainment whenever you want.

editorialNotes.standard: With a dizzying amount of content, Disney+ eloquently presents its massive catalog from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic for users to stream with wild abandon. And using GroupWatch, you and your friends can watch shows and movies synced in real-time‚Äîno matter where you are around the globe.

editorialNotes.standard: Before Canva came along, you had to invest in some pretty serious software (and have some pretty serious skills) to create even simple graphics. But with tens of thousands of templates and nearly unlimited ways to customize them, Canva has democratized design. With this easy-to-use app, you can master logos, posters, and invitations in minutes, not months.
editorialNotes.short: Quickly create posts for social media or your small business.

editorialNotes.standard: If you ever see a group of teenagers (or twenty- or thirtysomethings) filming themselves doing literally anything, know this: They‚Äôre probably making a video to share on TikTok. Its infinite scroll of new videos combines perfectly edited lip-synching, hilarious sketches, and mesmerizing dance moves with delightful special effects and filters. It‚Äôs hard not to fall in love with everyone‚Äôs fluffy pets, awkward parents, impressive glow-ups, fails of every kind, and songs and pop-culture references that spark a million memes.
editorialNotes.short: Make awesome short music videos that you can share with the world.
Create videos with ease and express your style with stickers.

editorialNotes.standard: Whether you‚Äôre looking for the latest can‚Äôt-miss dramas, comedies, or reality hits, Max has something for everyone. Watch HBO Original series like Succession, The Last of Us, The White Lotus, and Love & Death. Revisit classics like Friends, South Park, and The Big Bang Theory. And enjoy unscripted treats from Discovery like Fixer Upper, MythBusters, Dr. Pimple Popper, Deadliest Catch, and Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives.

Goodnotes is a digital notepad and PDF markup tool. And it‚Äôs very good at both. As a notepad, Goodnotes covers all the bases. Create notes with your keyboard or handwrite them with Apple Pencil. The app transforms your hand-drawn shapes into geometrically perfect ones. It‚Äôs also capable of recognizing your handwriting (even when you can‚Äôt) and converting it to text.
editorialNotes.short: ‚Ä£ For an app that lets you convert handwriting into text, try Goodnotes.

editorialNotes.standard: The long-awaited moment for Toca Boca fans has arrived. Toca Boca World, the newest edition to the popular series, brings together all the Toca Life apps, letting your beloved characters from different apps mingle in one beautiful world. And this unique world keeps growing: The app continually updates with new areas to explore and characters to meet.
editorialNotes.short: Enrich your child‚Äôs imagination through creative world-building.

editorialNotes.standard: There are a hundred different ways to share things with your friends, but Discord stands out as a particularly good one. You can create individual groups (called servers) for your friends: the group that you play videogames with, the group that goes to the cinema together, and so on. This app first made its name among videogame players, but these days, Discord is used by everyone, in no small part because it‚Äôs easy to understand, quick to set up, and slick to use.
editorialNotes.short: A social network for gamers to chat in real time.

editorialNotes.standard: With its compelling lineup of TV shows, movies, and original content, Hulu delivers a massive entertainment catalog directly to any device. With your subscription, watch episodes of The Handmaid‚Äôs Tale, Four Weddings and a Funeral, How I Met Your Father, Shrill, and more.

We love finding and pinning creative ideas, tasty recipes, and more. Pinterest‚Äôs wonderfully designed app is a constant source of inspiration, whether you‚Äôre planning a trip, remodeling your home, or finding something to wear. With a bevy of helpful features‚Äîfrom collaborative boards to built-in messaging‚ÄîPinterest is an exceptionally visual way to explore what matters to you.
editorialNotes.short: Get creative with your holiday decor.

editorialNotes.standard: Fans of critically acclaimed CBS series like The Good Fight, NCIS, The Stand, and The Late Show With Stephen Colbert will love Paramount+. Sports fans can stream the NCAA tournament, the UEFA Champions League, the NFL on CBS, and the Masters. Newshounds can tune in to 60 Minutes and CBS Evening News. Star Trek series past, present, and future are establishing their home base here too. And there‚Äôs loads to watch with kids, including Dora the Explorer, Paw Patrol, Blue‚Äôs Clues, and the best of Nickelodeon‚Äôs streaming catalog.

ios.subtitle: AI Note Taking and Study Help

editorialNotes.standard: We rely on this sleek, powerful notetaker to annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations, and more. With built-in iCloud support, it‚Äôs perfect for keeping notes, documents, and doodles up to date across your iPhone, iPad, and Mac.
editorialNotes.short: For notes that sync with the audio from your lecture or meeting, try Notability.

editorialNotes.standard: It‚Äôs hard to remember now, but there was a time, in the not-too-distant past, when people didn‚Äôt utter the phrase ‚Äúgo on mute‚Äù every single day. That‚Äôs just one of the ways Zoom has changed the landscape/society/fabric of space-time; what started as a videoconferencing app for business has become our go-to way (and word) for connecting with people in other places. Zoom‚Äôs meteoric rise came due to timing and circumstance, sure, but the app has met its moment with an elegant design, reliable performance, and constantly evolving features. But in the end, its real meaning is bigger: Zoom keeps us connected with each other.
editorialNotes.short: Stay connected with screen sharing and recording features for video calls.

editorialNotes.standard: From its humble origin as a fun way to send self-erasing photo messages, Snapchat has grown into one of our favorite social media apps. And not just for the hilarious face filters and cool geographical photo tags. It‚Äôs become one of the best ways to share memories, maintain friendships, and stay up to date on news and views from our go-to websites.
editorialNotes.short: Share the moment.

editorialNotes.standard: With its friendly approach and awesome updates, Duolingo‚Äôs long been one of our favorite apps for learning another language. Its secret: making the process genuinely fun. Engaging mini-games test your reading, writing, and speaking skills, and joining a club (where you can encourage and compete with others) adds a great social element. Bonus: all those languages and games are available for free!
editorialNotes.short: Learn a new language. Join a club, chat with bots, and get reminders to practice.

editorialNotes.standard: The beloved Australian pups‚ÄîBluey, Bingo, Chilli, and Bandit‚Äîare all here in Bluey: Let‚Äôs Play! It even lets us automatically color within the lines, giving our productions a sheen of perfection. We expect a call from the gallery any day now.

editorialNotes.standard: Level up your photo and video game with the all-in-one editor and collage maker Picsart. A quick snap or selfie can be supercharged with tools, filters, stickers and more‚Äîmaking it easy to create masterpieces and discover others doing the same. Whether you are trying to remove a background or seeking a total transformation of your Photos library‚Äôs finest, tapping into your creativity and whipping up scroll-stopping content has never been more fun.

editorialNotes.standard: Adobe Photoshop brings everything that defines the iconic desktop photo editor to iOS and iPadOS, complete with customizable interfaces optimized for touch (and Apple Pencil). editorialNotes.standard: Khan Academy Kids teaches early literacy, language, math, and social and emotional skills throughout its more than 1,000 games, videos, and stories. editorialNotes.standard: Here‚Äôs a simple truth: We don‚Äôt interact with documents on mobile the same way we do on desktop. So naturally, it makes sense that Microsoft reimagined Office for a uniquely mobile experience. With Word, PowerPoint, and Excel combined into one app, being productive feels frictionless. And we love that.

editorialNotes.standard: Adobe Lightroom is an essential tool for any discerning photographer. Its sleek interface and robust tools transform potato-quality images into stunning works of art with a few taps. And the best part? It‚Äôs nondestructive, giving you the freedom to experiment with all the controls without damaging the original photo.
